item.description:
Grand Llama Andy Marx, who is friends with one of the organizers, introduced me to this amazing run for a great cause. The race has been growing steadily, and last year featured a team competition (best average time of the top five finishers, old school style). Led by Andy, TMIRCE edged the Hyde School to take second behind the powerhouse Boston Bruins Foundation:

http://www.coolrunning.com/results/12/ma/Jan7_Resolu_set3.shtml

Join us! Sign up and select "TMIRCE" when you register. Let's start the new year right and bring home another team trophy! (Or at least have fun trying!)

http://resolutionrun2kickcancer.org/Site/5K_Run.html

Â 

NEW!!!

We have a Facebook event page: http://www.facebook.com/events/196567227134686

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 4th Annual 5K Resolution Run to Kick Cancer, Lexington, MA 1-5-13
